entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:14 a.m. CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog at times this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
